APP_DETAILS_DEPRECATED_ALERT_SUBTITLE: 此应用程序中的一个革命性变更阻止它自动更新。 您仍然可以使用此版本并手动更新，但建议切换到新版本并迁移您的数据。 您可以在应用商店以相同名称找到一个更新的版本。
APP_ERROR_APP_FAILED_TO_INSTALL: 安装应用程序 {id} 失败，查看日志获取更多详细信息
APP_ERROR_APP_FAILED_TO_RESET: 重置应用程序 {id} 失败，查看日志获取更多详细信息
APP_ERROR_APP_FAILED_TO_START: 启动应用程序 {id} 失败，查看日志获取更多详细信息
APP_ERROR_APP_FAILED_TO_STOP: 停止应用程序 {id} 失败，查看日志获取更多详细信息
APP_ERROR_APP_FAILED_TO_RESTART: Failed to restart app {id}, see logs for more details
APP_ERROR_APP_FAILED_TO_UNINSTALL: 卸载应用程序 {id} 失败，查看日志获取更多详细信息
APP_ERROR_APP_FAILED_TO_UPDATE: 更新应用程序 {id} 失败，查看日志获取更多详细信息
APP_ERROR_APP_FORCE_EXPOSED: App {id} 只能使用公开域名
APP_ERROR_ARCHITECTURE_NOT_SUPPORTED: Your architecture {arch} is not supported by app {id}
APP_ERROR_DOMAIN_ALREADY_IN_USE: 域名 {domain} 已被应用程序 {id} 使用
APP_ERROR_DOMAIN_REQUIRED_IF_EXPOSE_APP: 如果应用程序被暴露给公网则需要域名
APP_ERROR_INVALID_CONFIG: App {id} 有无效的 config.json 文件
APP_INSTALL_FORM_DOMAIN_NAME_HINT: 请确保此域名包含一个指向您的 IP 的记录。
APP_INSTALL_FORM_ERROR_BETWEEN_LENGTH: {label} 必须在 {min} 和 {max} 字符之间
APP_INSTALL_FORM_ERROR_FQDNIP: {label} 必须是一个有效的域或IP地址
APP_INSTALL_FORM_ERROR_INVALID_EMAIL: {label} 必须是一个有效的电子邮件地址
APP_INSTALL_FORM_ERROR_IP: {label} 必须是一个有效的 IP 地址
APP_INSTALL_FORM_ERROR_URL: {label} 必须是一个有效的 URL
APP_INSTALL_FORM_OPEN_PORT_HINT: Open a port on the host? This app will be accessible at {internalIp}:{port}. (Easiest but less secure)
APP_INSTALL_FORM_EXPOSE_LOCAL_HINT: Expose the app on the local network? This app will be accessible at {appId}.{domain}. (Visit settings page to setup your local domain)
APP_RESET_FORM_SUBTITLE: 此应用的所有数据将丢失。
APP_RESET_FORM_WARNING: 您确定吗？这个操作无法撤销。
APP_BACKUP_SUBTITLE: A tar archive will be created in the backups folder to store your app's data.
APP_RESTORE_WARNING: Do you really want to restore backup {id} made on {date}?
APP_RESTORE_SUBTITLE: All the current data of the app will be erased and replaced with the data from the backup. It is recommended to backup your app before restoring.
APP_UNINSTALL_FORM_SUBTITLE: 此应用的所有数据将丢失。
APP_UNINSTALL_FORM_WARNING: 您确定吗？这个操作无法撤销。
APP_UPDATE_CONFIG_SUCCESS: 应用程序配置更新成功。重启应用以应用更改
APP_UPDATE_ERROR_MIN_TIPI_VERSION: App {id} update requires Tipi version {minVersion} or higher. Please update your instance.
APP_UPDATE_FORM_SUBTITLE_2: 这将重置您的自定义配置(如：docker-compose. yml中的更改)
APP_BACKUP_ERROR: Failed to backup {id}, see logs for more details
APP_RESTORE_ERROR: Failed to restore {id}, see logs for more details
AUTH_ERROR_ADMIN_ALREADY_EXISTS: 已经有一个管理员用户。请登录并从管理面板创建一个新用户。
AUTH_ERROR_INVALID_PASSWORD_LENGTH: 密码不得少于 8 个字符
AUTH_ERROR_NO_CHANGE_PASSWORD_REQUEST: 找不到更改密码的请求
AUTH_ERROR_TOTP_ALREADY_ENABLED: 这个用户已启用两步验证
AUTH_FORM_ERROR_EMAIL_REQUIRED: 需要提供电子邮件地址
AUTH_RESET_PASSWORD_INSTRUCTIONS: To get started, run this command on your server and then refresh this page. If you have previously done so, the password reset request may have expired. In that case please retry
AUTH_RESET_PASSWORD_SUCCESS: 您的密码已重置。您现在可以使用您的新密码登录。您的电子邮件 {email}
AUTH_TOTP_INSTRUCTIONS: 请输入您的双重验证应用中显示的验证码
DASHBOARD_IP_WARNING: Warning, you might be at risk! it looks like you are accessing your instance through a public IP address. This makes your dashboard and all apps that you install vulnerable to attackers
DELETE_BACKUP_MODAL_WARNING: Are you sure you want to delete backup {id} made on {date}?
GUEST_DASHBOARD_NO_APPS_SUBTITLE: Ask your administrator to add apps to the guest dashboard or login to see your apps.
LINKS_ADD_SUBTITLE: Add external link to the dashboard
LINKS_DELETE_SUBTITLE: Are you sure you want to delete this external link?
MY_APPS_EMPTY_SUBTITLE: 从应用商店安装一个应用程序以开始
MY_APPS_UPDATE_ALL_FORM_SUBTITLE_1: Do you want to update all your apps to the latest version?
MY_APPS_UPDATE_ALL_FORM_SUBTITLE_2: This will update all your apps to the latest version. Make sure you've read the release notes of the apps and you've backed up your app data.
SETTINGS_ACTIONS_MAINTENANCE_SUBTITLE: 在您的实例中执行的常见操作
SETTINGS_ACTIONS_NEW_VERSION: Tipi 的新版本 ({version}) 可用
SETTINGS_ACTIONS_UPDATE_REPO_SUBTITLE: Use this button to update your appstore
SETTINGS_ACTIONS_UPDATE_REPO_MODAL_SUBTI: This will reset your repository and pull the latest changes from GitHub
SETTINGS_GENERAL_ALLOW_AUTO_THEMES_HINT: Be surprised by themes that change automatically based on the time of the year.
SETTINGS_GENERAL_ALLOW_ERROR_MONITORING_: Error monitoring is used to track errors and improve Tipi. Keep this option enabled to help us improve Tipi.
SETTINGS_GENERAL_DOMAIN_NAME_HINT: 请确保此域名包含一个指向您的 IP 的记录。
SETTINGS_GENERAL_GUEST_DASHBOARD_HINT: This will allow non-authenticated users to see a limited dashboard and easily access the running apps on your instance.
SETTINGS_GENERAL_INTERNAL_IP_HINT: 您的服务器正在侦听的 IP 地址
SETTINGS_GENERAL_LOCAL_DOMAIN_HINT: 访问本地网络应用所使用的域名。您的应用将可以在app-name.local-domain访问。
SETTINGS_GENERAL_SETTINGS_UPDATED: 设置已更新。重新启动您的实例以应用新设置。
SETTINGS_GENERAL_STORAGE_PATH_HINT: Path to the storage directory. Make sure it is an absolute path and that it exists.
SETTINGS_GENERAL_SUBTITLE: 这将更新您的 settings.json 文件。在更新这些值之前，请确保您知道您正在做什么。
SETTINGS_SECURITY_2FA_SUBTITLE: 两步验证 (2FA) 为您的账户添加额外的一层安全保护。
SETTINGS_SECURITY_2FA_SUBTITLE_2: 如果启用，当您登录时，您将会被提示从您的身份验证器应用程序输入代码。
SETTINGS_SECURITY_CHANGE_PASSWORD_SUBTIT: 更改您的密码将使您退出所有设备。
SETTINGS_SECURITY_CHANGE_USERNAME_FORM_I: 必须是一个有效的电子邮件地址
SETTINGS_SECURITY_CHANGE_USERNAME_FORM_P: Your password is required to change your username.
SETTINGS_SECURITY_CHANGE_USERNAME_SUBTIT: Changing your username will log you out of all devices.
SETTINGS_SECURITY_ENTER_2FA_CODE: 请输入您从身份验证应用上获得的6位数代码
SETTINGS_SECURITY_PASSWORD_NEEDED_HINT: 更改双重身份验证设置需要您的密码。
SETTINGS_SECURITY_SCAN_QR_CODE: 使用验证器应用扫描这个二维码
SYSTEM_ERROR_CURRENT_VERSION_IS_LATEST: 当前版本已经是最新版本
SYSTEM_ERROR_DEMO_MODE_LIMIT: 在演示模式下只能安装6个应用。请卸载其他应用来安装新应用。
SYSTEM_ERROR_MAJOR_VERSION_UPDATE: 主要版本已更新。请手动更新 (参照更新记录上的指示)
SYSTEM_ERROR_YOU_MUST_BE_LOGGED_IN: You must be logged in to perform this action
